newsitem.title: USA: Continental Air cuts fares up to 50 pct.
newsitem.headline: Continental Air cuts fares up to 50 pct.

text.p: Continental Airlines said on Monday that it is offering fares discounted up to 50 percent off regular 21-day advance purchase fares.
AMR Corp's American Airlines said on Sunday that it is offering discounts of up to 50 percent for travel to most 48 state destinations.

Continental said tickets for all destinations must be purchased by April 14. Sale fares apply to travel now through May 5 for the deepest discounts and up to 45 percent savings for domestic travel through September 6, 1997.
Tickets must be purchased within 24 hours of making a revervation, require a seven-day advance purchase and a Saturday night stay, Continental said.
Continental said sale fares are also available to Canada, Mexico, Latin America and the Caribbean.
